description:
Fabletics Inc. is currently looking for an Inventory Accountant.
Fabletics Inc. gives professionals across the globe access to a career they want at a company they’re passionate about. We love fashion! Through our curated approach, Fabletics Inc. reaches over 40 Million members across 7 countries – giving our customers access to on-trend fashions at a price they love.
This position will report to the Director of Inventory Control
What You Will Do
  • Assist in the timely completion of monthly close responsibilities for Inventory and COGS
  • Investigation and reconciliation of variances between system interfaces
  • Maintain spreadsheets to report and analyze data related to Inventory and COGS
  • Maintain and produce reporting for Wholesale/Consignment transactions
  • Maintain data for landed cost components and WIP
  • Maintaining effective relationships with business partners
  • Ad hoc reporting and analysis as needed

What You Can Bring
  • Strong proficiency with Microsoft Excel
  • 1-2 years accounting experience required
  • Ability to effectively multitask, problem solve & prioritize
  • Advanced working knowledge of Excel
  • A detailed, methodical and organized approach to tasks
  • Sound communication and interpersonal skills with a customer service focus
  • Excellent numeric skills with a sound logical approach to analytics

Nice To Have
  • Inventory accounting experience desired
  • Retail and/or Fashion industry experience highly desired

Compensation & Total Rewards At Fabletics, we believe work and life should fit together! We continue to build a culture of flexibility, to empower you to do your best and put yourself first. Our Total Rewards program rewards employees for their hard work, supporting their health, well-being, families, and ultimately their life journey. Total Rewards at Fabletics includes:
  • -Hybrid Work Schedule*
  • -Discretionary Paid Time Off*
  • -Summer Fridays*
  • -Healthcare Plans
  • -Employee Discounts
  • -401k
  • -Annual Bonus Program
  • -Equity Program*
  • -And More
  • *Varied for retail and fulfillment roles

The annual base salary range for this position is from $67,000-$82,000. The range provided includes the base salary that Fabletics expects to pay for the role. Offered base salary will be dependent on factors including the scope and complexity of the role, candidate’s related work experience, subject matter expertise and work location.
Fabletics, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. We recruit, employ, compensate, develop, and promote regardless of race, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, genetic information, veteran status, and other protected status as required by applicable. At Fabletics, Inc., we champion a vibrant workplace culture that thrives on diversity law and do not tolerate discrimination or harassment. We are one team from many backgrounds, innovating through diversity of individuals, who are driven by passion for creating an inclusive space for all. Fabletics, Inc. will continue to champion a workplace culture that prizes diversity and inclusivity. We encourage you to apply regardless of meeting all qualifications and/or requirements.
